Umgardi

 

About us

--

Umgardi is a privately owned business registered in the province of Ontario in Canada. We strive to provide quality services to our customers through our offerings. With over 12 years combined experience in the web hosting industry, we push to continue offering the same top notch support people have come to know and love from their provider.

 

VPSBoard Special

--

As an added bonus for VPSBoard until November 3rd, 2013, receive $5 off of your first month of service by using the coupon code VPSBoard5.

 

VPS Features

--

The following is included with every VPS package:

IPv4 & IPv6 Dual-Stack

Powered By KVM

Dedicated Resources

Management Panel

Choice of Operating Systems

We offer the option to roll your own OS. Once you place your order, feel free to open a ticket and provide us with a URL to the ISO you would like to deploy.

Canadian Support

Bandwidth Overage Protection

Why live in fear that you'll go over your transfer cap? Sleep in peace with our Bandwidth Overage Protection.

We will notify you if you come close to your bandwidth cap, and make suggestions for long term bandwidth requirements. 

Burst over the limit on one month? No sweat. No overage.

RAID 1 Mirroring
